projects: [{"title":"Easy Weather App","start_date":"Mar 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Easy Weather App is a web application to check the current weather condition of any city easily. The project is build using Django and Open Weather Map API."},{"title":"Face Recognition Attendance System","start_date":"Dec 2020","end_date":"Feb 2021","description":"The Face Recognition Attendance System helps the teachers to take easy attendance of their students using a simple web app. The project uses Django for the web app and OpenCV for recognizing the students face. Once recognized, the attendance is loaded into the teacher's attendance sheet along with the time at which attendance is put by the student."},{"title":"PathaPadha Website","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020"},{"title":"Blog Web Application","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Aug 2020","description":"The Blog Web app is created entirely using Django Framework. Users can register themselves in the portal and post their blogs and thoughts. All the blogs posted can be seen by anyone who visits the site. The code link is as follows. You can download the code and run it on your local host server to run and see it."},{"title":"Guessing Game","start_date":"Jun 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"This is a number guessing game. Its fun to play. Made by using HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap."}]
